title: Sebastian the fox: the sleepwalkers
creator_credit: Tim Burstall, Patrick Ryan and Eltham Films
brief_description: Puppet film featuring Sebastian Fox up to his cunning tricks again - disturbing the sleep of two grown-ups. He pulls off the bed-clothes, then frightens them by appearing as a ghost. Finally, Sebastian locks out the couple and takes over the bed. Puppets by Peter Scriven.
